petNameAdd:
1) State Of Assam
    Advocate - Manjit kumar Ghose

business_details.Business: Accused Kartick Barman is acquitted of the charge under Section 8 of the POCSO Act and set at liberty forthwith.Accused Opiul Sheikh is convicted for the offence under Section 8 of the POCSO Act and sentenced to rigorous imprisonment for 3 years with payment of fine of Rs 5,000 in default of payment of fine, to undergo imprisonment for 3 months.
